name: Lightless - Demo Version 1
description:
A demo for our Hollow Knight inspired game "Lightless". This is the first version of the game demo. It's also a continuation of our "Illumination of Gourd" game concept.

Play the game by running the "GRG_IOG_2D.exe" file in the folder.

Art and animation by:
Katarina Ankjær Helstrup
https://www.katarinahelstrup.com/
&
Joseph Gignoux
https://josephgignoux.artstation.com/
